From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Skulletron::

	Skulletron put his hands up in the air as Chordate pointed his laser gun
at him.

	"Put your weapons down!  I'm not hostile!  I only wish to serve the
Maximals!  Please, give me a chance to prove loyalty!  You see, I was born
on this planet, and I eventually found my destiny in the Maximals!  Please,
please!  Don't shoot!  Let me join you!  See, even look at my chest!"
Skulletron said, still holding his hands up in the air.
